Temperature.description: The temperature reading from the environment in degrees Celsius.

Sensor1.description: The reading from Sensor 1, unitless as it is likely normalized or abstract.

Sensor2.description: The reading from Sensor 2, unitless as it is likely normalized or abstract.

Sensor3.description: The reading from Sensor 3, unitless as it is likely normalized or abstract.

Sensor4.description: The reading from Sensor 4, unitless as it is likely normalized or abstract.

Sensor5.description: The reading from Sensor 5, unitless as it is likely normalized or abstract.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing temperature and sensor data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the sensor readings, please predict the temperature.
